description: Enterprise techniques used by Suckfly, ATT&CK group G0039 v1.0
name: Suckfly (G0039)

techniques.comment: [Suckfly](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0039) the victim's internal network for hosts with ports 8080, 5900, and 40 open.
Several tools used by [Suckfly](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0039) have been command-line driven.
[Suckfly](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0039) used a signed credential-dumping tool to obtain victim account credentials.
[Suckfly](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0039) has used stolen certificates to sign its malware.
[Suckfly](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0039) used legitimate account credentials that they dumped to navigate the internal victim network as though they were the legitimate account owner.
